description: Try our easy to follow Mushroom, Capsicum, Spinach & Bocconcini Pasta recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Mushroom, Capsicum, Spinach & Bocconcini Pasta Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook pasta in a large saucepan of salted boiling water until just tender as per packet instructions. Drain and return pasta to saucepan.

Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a large deep frying pan over mediumhigh heat. Add mushrooms and cook for 8-10 minutes or until golden. Add capsicum and cook for 2 minutes. Add spinach leaves, stir and remove pan from heat.
Add vegetable mixture, bocconcini, remaining oil and balsamic vinegar to pasta.
Toss until well combined. Serve immediately with crusty bread.
